definition: variant of 鏈|链[lian4], chain/variant of 煉|炼[lian4]
eight trigrams furnace to cook pills of immortality/symbol of the alchemist's art/Double, double toil and trouble, Fire burn, and cauldron bubble
maker of immortality pill/concocting magic pills

sentences.english: Spirit thousand unreal at the last moment to give up the blast, and black king fight happened.
sentences.chinese: 灵千幻在最后关头放弃了炼丹，与黑大王发生了打斗。

sentences.english: The bagua style refers to that in which all buildings surround the danlu, a stove to make elixirs.
sentences.chinese: 八卦型指的是围着炼丹炉的所有建筑物的布局。

sentences.english: A hermit is said to have practiced alchemy here .
sentences.chinese: 据说有位隐士曾在此炼丹。

sentences.english: Ancient Alchemy is the earliest chemistry experiment.
sentences.chinese: 古代的炼丹术是最早的化学实验。

sentences.english: Ever since they were young they had practiced the science of alchemy.
sentences.chinese: 以往，因为他们年轻，他们实行了科学的炼丹术。

sentences.english: And some of them believe that it comes of ancient alchemy and spagytism.
sentences.chinese: 不少学者认为源于古代的炼丹术和炼金术。

sentences.english: Buildings were symmetrical in layout, diversified in form and magnificent in style.
sentences.chinese: 八卦型指的是围着炼丹炉的所有建筑物的布局。

definition: maker of immortality pill/concocting magic pills
legendary magic potion of immortals/panacea/fig. wonder solution to a problem
variant of 鏈|链[lian4], chain/variant of 煉|炼[lian4]
(of Taoists) to practice austerities/to practice asceticism
legendary magic potion of immortals/panacea/fig. wonder solution to a problem
Lingshi county in Jinzhong 晉中|晋中[Jin4 zhong1], Shanxi
to open a furnace/to start up a furnace
(Taoism) talisman in the form of a painting of symbols thought to have magical powers
